Distracting Shield

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Wis 15, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit: If you hit a foe with an attack granted by your Combat Challenge class feature, the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.
Special: You must have a shield equipped to benefit from this feat.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 194.
